Mr. BARRETT. Mr. Speaker, I move to suspend the rules and pass the  bill (H.R. 3423) to amend title 49, United States Code, to include  aircraft deicing storage facilities in the definition of airport  development, and for other purposes, as amended.

Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 390, the ACERO Act, sponsored  by Representatives Fong and…

…H.R. 3423,  the Facility for Runway Operations and Safe Transportation Act, or the  FROST Act.

This bipartisan legislation makes a simple but critical update to  title 49 of the United States Code by including aircraft deicing  storage facilities in the definition of airport development.
